mapper.select: SELECT MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE AS mvTitle, MOVIE.MOVIE_STAR AS mvStar FROM MOVIE JOIN MOVIE_WISH ON MOVIE.MOVIE_ID = MOVIE_WISH.MOVIE_ID WHERE MOVIE_WISH.ID = #{id}
